description: Represents a runtime environment that can run migrated mainframe applications.

EfsStorageConfiguration.description: Defines the storage configuration for an Amazon EFS file system.

MountPoint.description: The mount point for the file system.

EngineType.description: The target platform for the environment.

FsxStorageConfiguration.description: Defines the storage configuration for an Amazon FSx file system.

MountPoint.description: The mount point for the file system.

HighAvailabilityConfig.description: Defines the details of a high availability configuration.

StorageConfiguration.description: Defines the storage configuration for an environment.

TagMap.description: Defines tags associated to an environment.

Description.markdownDescription:
The description of the environment.

---

Required: No

Type: string   

Maximum Length: 500   

Update requires: No interruption

EngineType.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No

Type:      

Update requires: No interruption

EngineVersion.description: The version of the runtime engine for the environment.
EngineVersion.markdownDescription:
The version of the runtime engine for the environment.

---

Required: No

Type: string    

Pattern: ^\S{1,10}$  

Update requires: No interruption

EnvironmentArn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the runtime environment.
EnvironmentArn.markdownDescription:
The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the runtime environment.

---

Required: No

Type: string    

Pattern: ^arn:(aws|aws-cn|aws-iso|aws-iso-[a-z]{1}|aws-us-gov):[A-Za-z0-9][A-Za-z0-9_/.-]{0,62}:([a-z]{2}-((iso[a-z]{0,1}-)|(gov-)){0,1}[a-z]+-[0-9]):[0-9]{12}:[A-Za-z0-9/][A-Za-z0-9:_/+=,@.-]{0,1023}$  

Update requires: No interruption

EnvironmentId.description: The unique identifier of the environment.
EnvironmentId.markdownDescription:
The unique identifier of the environment.

---

Required: No

Type: string    

Pattern: ^\S{1,80}$  

Update requires: No interruption

HighAvailabilityConfig.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No

Type:      

Update requires: No interruption

InstanceType.description: The type of instance underlying the environment.
InstanceType.markdownDescription:
The type of instance underlying the environment.

---

Required: No

Type: string    

Pattern: ^\S{1,20}$  

Update requires: No interruption

Name.markdownDescription:
The name of the environment.

---

Required: No

Type: string    

Pattern: ^[A-Za-z0-9][A-Za-z0-9_\-]{1,59}$  

Update requires: No interruption

PreferredMaintenanceWindow.description: Configures a desired maintenance window for the environment. If you do not provide a value, a random system-generated value will be assigned.
PreferredMaintenanceWindow.markdownDescription:
Configures a desired maintenance window for the environment. If you do not provide a value, a random system-generated value will be assigned.

---

Required: No

Type: string    

Pattern: ^\S{1,50}$  

Update requires: No interruption

PubliclyAccessible.description: Specifies whether the environment is publicly accessible.
PubliclyAccessible.markdownDescription:
Specifies whether the environment is publicly accessible.

---

Required: No

Type: boolean     

Update requires: No interruption

SecurityGroupIds.description: The list of security groups for the VPC associated with this environment.
SecurityGroupIds.markdownDescription:
The list of security groups for the VPC associated with this environment.

---

Required: No

Type: array     

Update requires: No interruption

StorageConfigurations.description: The storage configurations defined for the runtime environment.
StorageConfigurations.markdownDescription:
The storage configurations defined for the runtime environment.

---

Required: No

Type: array     

Update requires: No interruption

SubnetIds.description: The unique identifiers of the subnets assigned to this runtime environment.
SubnetIds.markdownDescription:
The unique identifiers of the subnets assigned to this runtime environment.

---

Required: No

Type: array     

Update requires: No interruption

Tags associated to this environment.
